text: @DavidJUrban @realDonaldTrump @HillaryClinton @JoeBiden Hey nut jobs-do you think putting coal miners out of work is worse than sitting on your fat orang ass tweeting all day ignoring warnings of this pandemic & killing thousands of Americans? STFU! Twat! #coronavirus #TrumpLiesAmericansDie
